bio: Nikolai Petrov is an avant-garde painter from Moscow, working in the tradition of Russian Constructivism. His geometric compositions and bold use of form reflect the dynamic energy of contemporary Russian art while honoring the innovative spirit of early 20th-century Russian avant-garde.

media.videoPost: Constructivist compositions in my Moscow studio. Geometric forms and bold colors create dynamic energy. The innovative spirit of Russian avant-garde lives on through my work. Art as a force for change and expression. #Constructivism #AvantGarde #MoscowArtist
